dcterms:creator: M. E. Brachet
D. I. Meiron
S. A. Orszag
B. Nickel
R. H. Morf
U. Frisch
dcterms:description: The 2D Taylor-Green vortex dataset captures the small-scale structure of the vortex, demonstrating the onset of turbulence under periodic boundary conditions.
dcterms:title: 2D Taylor-Green vortex (TGV)

dcterms:creator: D. A. Fedosov
B. Caswell
G. Em Karniadakis
dcterms:description: The 2D Reverse Poiseuille flow dataset simulates fluid flow in a channel with a spatially varying force field, capturing the dynamics of laminar and transitional flows.
dcterms:title: 2D Reverse Poiseuille flow (RPF)

dcterms:creator: U. Ghia
K. N. Ghia
C. Shin
dcterms:description: The 2D Lid-driven cavity dataset represents fluid flow in a cavity driven by a moving lid, showcasing the effects of boundary conditions on flow dynamics.
dcterms:title: 2D Lid-driven cavity (LDC)

dcterms:creator: A. Colagrossi
M. Landrini
dcterms:description: The 2D Dam break dataset simulates the dynamics of fluid flow resulting from the sudden release of water, capturing free surface effects and wave propagation.
dcterms:title: 2D Dam break (DAM)

dcterms:creator: M. E. Brachet
D. Meiron
S. Orszag
B. Nickel
R. Morf
U. Frisch
dcterms:description: The 3D Taylor-Green vortex dataset captures the fully developed turbulence in three dimensions, providing insights into the dynamics of turbulent flows.
dcterms:title: 3D Taylor-Green vortex (TGV)

dcterms:creator: D. A. Fedosov
B. Caswell
G. Em Karniadakis
dcterms:description: The 3D Reverse Poiseuille flow dataset simulates fluid flow in a three-dimensional channel with a spatially varying force field, capturing complex flow dynamics.
dcterms:title: 3D Reverse Poiseuille flow (RPF)

dcterms:creator: U. Ghia
K. N. Ghia
C. Shin
dcterms:description: The 3D Lid-driven cavity dataset represents fluid flow in a three-dimensional cavity driven by a moving lid, showcasing the effects of boundary conditions on flow dynamics.
dcterms:title: 3D Lid-driven cavity (LDC)

dcterms:creator: A. Colagrossi
M. Landrini
dcterms:description: The 3D Dam break dataset simulates the dynamics of fluid flow resulting from the sudden release of water in three dimensions, capturing free surface effects and wave propagation.
dcterms:title: 3D Dam break (DAM)
